reviewText: Guys, this is the definitive collection if you want to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce about what erotica was like in the good old days.

Slick packaging, good quality manufacture and a few interesting scenes are not enough to make this DVD worth the price.  The video transfer quality is  good but most of the loops appear to have be taken right out of the last arcade machine where they ran.  Virtually all of the loops have been cut (most probably to comply with local laws); some show excessive wear and/or breaks in the film.

Less than 20% of the material is new to me; the rest I've seen, in whole or part, in videos from other sources.  Still and all, if you are new to 50s arcade loops this DVD might be a good first choice.  Otherwise, do some more shopping before buying this one.
